definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: To sum up all, uprisings have been disastrous.
sentences.chinese: 总之，暴动是件祸国殃民的事。

sentences.english: On Sabertron, the Destrons incite an uprising among the prisoners.
sentences.chinese: 塞伯特恩之迪斯坦逆党煽动囚犯暴动。

sentences.english: Rwanda's support for the CNDP is fuelling much of the violence.
sentences.chinese: 卢旺达对CNDP的支持已经激起许多暴动。

sentences.english: Catch me up on all your sordid little insurrections.
sentences.chinese: 赶上了我所有的肮脏的小暴动。

sentences.english: Strikes, Riots and Civil Commotions (S. R. C. C. )
He has put out this counter insurgence strategy, it's a three point stategy.
sentences.chinese: 他提出了一项新的反暴动策略，这个策略主要有三点。

sentences.english: Every man assembled knew that his presence meant a near-certain death sentence if the revolt failed.
sentences.chinese: 每一个参加者都清楚暴动失败意味着必死的判决。

sentences.english: Philadelphia has been the lucky host for a series of mini-riots.
sentences.chinese: 费城有幸成为一系列“迷你暴动”的举办地。

sentences.english: In the uprising the serfs fought with bare hands against gunfire.
sentences.chinese: 在暴动中，农奴们以赤手空拳对付钢枪铁炮。

sentences.english: The rioters in Egypt were freedom fighters; the rioters in London were punks and thugs.
sentences.chinese: 埃及的暴动者是自由战士，伦敦的却是阿飞和恶棍。

sentences.english: Comparing fire discipline during these riots with earlier riots may be instructive.
sentences.chinese: 比较这些暴动前期的射击纪律是很有启发性的。

sentences.english: Zhuoma thought the rioters had left, so she called on her friends to escape.
sentences.chinese: 卓玛以为暴动者已经离开，因此叫上同伴一起逃走。

sentences.english: Otherwise the riot was conducted after the most scientific military tactics.
sentences.chinese: 并且暴动是按最高明的陆军战术进行的。

sentences.english: The economic plight of the urban poor was the main factor behind the May 1998 anti-Chinese riots.
sentences.chinese: 村庄穷人的经济困境是一九八五年排华暴动的主因。

sentences.english: The crime of escaping from prison by a riot appears in China's Criminal Law for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 暴动越狱罪出现于我国刑法典尚属首次。

sentences.english: Is war less of a scourge than an uprising is of a calamity?
sentences.chinese: 难道战争的祸害不大于暴动的灾难吗？

definition: mutiny/(Tw) to be dumped by one's girlfriend while serving in the army
variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]
